bluecast.ml_modelling.base_classes.PredictedProbas¶
bluecast.ml_modelling.base_classes.PredictedClasses¶
class bluecast.ml_modelling.base_classes.BaseClassMlModel[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base class for all ML models.

Enforces the implementation of the fit and predict methods. If hyperparameter tuning is required, then the fit method should implement the tuning.

abstract fit(x_train: pandas.DataFrame, x_test: pandas.DataFrame, y_train: pandas.Series, y_test: pandas.Series) → Any | None[source]¶
abstract predict(df: pandas.DataFrame) → Tuple[PredictedProbas, PredictedClasses][source]¶

Predict on unseen data.

:return tuple of predicted probabilities and predicted classes

class bluecast.ml_modelling.base_classes.BaseClassMlRegressionModel[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base class for all ML models.

Enforces the implementation of the fit and predict methods. If hyperparameter tuning is required, then the fit method should implement the tuning.

abstract predict(df: pandas.DataFrame) → numpy.ndarray[source]¶

Predict on unseen data.

:return numpy array of predictions
